title: Simple Energy eScooters to be on roads from June, sets 1L target
description: The company has registered 50,000 bookings of Simple One priced at ₹1.10 lakh (ex-showroom) in the past six months. Simple Energy will commence deliveries of the product from June this year. Additionally, on cards is a smaller electric scooter tagged between ₹65,000-85,000 which will be launched at the heart of the market by the end of this calendar year.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
